alert.note: Alert for Marshall; Poweshiek; Tama (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 12:37AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Poweshiek, east central Marshall and Tama Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1236 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tama, or near Toledo, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Additional heavy rainfall of one to two inches. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Ponding of ponding of water on roadways, low visibilities, and rises in small streams and creeks. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Poweshiek, east central Marshall and Tama Counties, including the following locations... Le Grand, Gladbrook, Hartwick, Elberon, Montour, Garwin, Victor, Toledo Municipal Airport, Holiday Lake and Chelsea. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
